abstract: “Angels,” or well-heeled investors willing to finance startup companies, must be cautious. High business failure rates and slow-to-flourish enterprises are common pitfalls.
snippet: “Angels,” or well-heeled investors willing to finance startup companies, must be cautious. High business failure rates and slow-to-flourish enterprises are common pitfalls.
lead_paragraph: AFTER Jim Connor sold SymPro, his software company, to JPMorgan Chase in 2003, he discovered that he was more popular with strangers.

abstract: After Bear Stearns was taken over by JPMorgan Chase in a government-brokered deal, there was much speculation about where the bank’s former chieftain, Alan D. Schwartz, would end up.
lead_paragraph: After Bear Stearns was taken over by JPMorgan Chase in a government-brokered deal, there was much speculation about where the bank’s former chieftain, Alan D. Schwartz, would end up.

headline.main: Schwartz Said to Make Rothschild His Basecamp

abstract: Dow Chemical, whose proposed acquisition of Rohm and Haas is under antitrust review, said Wednesday it hired JPMorgan Chase to consider various divestiture options.
lead_paragraph: Dow Chemical, whose proposed acquisition of Rohm and Haas is under antitrust review, said Wednesday it hired JPMorgan Chase to consider various divestiture options.

headline.main: Dow Weighs Divestitures Ahead of Rohm Deal

abstract: After an awkward rift, it seems as if JPMorgan Chase is in Dow Chemical‘s good graces again.
lead_paragraph: After an awkward rift, it seems as if JPMorgan Chase is in Dow Chemical‘s good graces again.

headline.main: JPMorgan and Dow Move Beyond Buyout Flap
